note: Initial loudness calibration for US Pop based on the 1985–1986 Billboard US Year-End Hot 100 Top 40 cohort, using Spotify->Logic Pro X capture compared to offline Spotify (Kaggle) audio features.

capture_profile.description: Tracks streamed from Spotify, recorded into Logic Pro X, normalized/mixed by Keith, then exported; loudness_LUFS measured via music-advisor.

reference_sample.cohort: Billboard US Year-End Hot 100 Top 40 (per year)

market_norms_for_axes.intended_use: Copy loudness_mean_lufs into MARKET_NORMS.loudness_mean and loudness_std_lufs into MARKET_NORMS.loudness_std inside calibration/market_norms_us_pop.json for the LoudnessFit axis in hci_axes.compute_axes.
market_norms_for_axes.future_notes: When the calibration set expands beyond 1985–1986 (e.g., full 1985–present Top 40), recompute mean/std and bump version to us_pop_loudness_v2, keeping this file for reproducibility.
